trigger.recovery_expression: {Template SNMP Eaton ATS:DeviceStatusOperationMode.last()}=5 or {Template SNMP Eaton ATS:DeviceStatusOperationMode.last()}=4
trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} - Power Source Changed

voltage Derated Range And Freq Normal Range
voltage And Freq Normal Range Waveform Nok
